title: 转账晒尸
author: FnTlv
txt_content:
本帖最后由 skyliye 于 2020-4-24 02:07 编辑 

如题 worldguard 领域内 不能右键npc 要给玩家什么权限啊

replies.author: Xiao_Wua
replies.txt_content: 输入/rg flag <区域名> interact allow

replies.author: FnTlv
replies.txt_content: 提示：sorry，but you can't use that here 怎么解决

replies.author: 知足常乐1
replies.txt_content:
/rg addowner spawn g:builder  
spawn替换为设置的wg名字，g:builder，替换为默认组名

replies.author: 知足常乐1
replies.txt_content:
FnTlv 发表于 2020-4-23 21:28
提示：sorry，but you can't use that here 怎么解决
汗#说错了,addowner，是增加所有者，你替换为addmember，是增加用户

replies.author: qaz1055108489
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽
